# hideOtherApplications(_:)

**Instance Method**

Hides all apps, except the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func hideOtherApplications(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object that sent this message.

## Hiding apps

- **unhideAllApplications(_:)**: Unhides all apps, including the receiver.
